# cook your code here
t = int(raw_input())
for _ in range(0,t):
    n = int(raw_input())
    A = raw_input().split()
    B = raw_input().split()
    for i in range(0,n):
        A[i] = int(A[i])
        B[i] = int(B[i])
    count = 0
    A.sort()
    B.sort()
    i =0
    j=0
    while(i<n and j<n):
        if(A[i]>B[j]):
            j+=1
        else:
            count+=1
            i+=1
            j+=1
    print count;
